outputs.output_descr: UNDP Uganda has designed this Project Initiation Plan (PIP) to support the finalization of the Disaster Risk Rediction (DRR)  project that will strengthen Uganda's Disaster Preparedness and Management Capacities. The Project initiation will focus on the following key components; (i) finalisation of the project document  (ii) development of strategic programme and investment framework and  (iii) Oversight and overall coordination of the initiation phase. Key outputs of the initiation phase will include: (i) finalized and signed up project document and (ii) Disaster Risk Recovery  strategic programme investment framework.

i. Strengthened national DRR institutions, enhanced sectoral coordination and DRR mainstreamed into national and sector-specific development policies and programmes
ii. Evidence base for DRR generated and post-disaster recovery strengthened
iii. Enhanced community resilience to disasters
iv. Training and capacity building for comprehensive disaster risk reduction

project_title: Strengthening Ug. Disaster Preparedness & Mgt Cap
